metadata.Title: CVE-2023-24607 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.Description: Qt before 6.4.3 allows a denial of service via a crafted string when theSQL ODBC driver plugin is used and the size of SQLTCHAR is 4. The affectedversions are 5.x before 5.15.13, 6.x before 6.2.8, and 6.3.x before 6.4.3.

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src-gles package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
